Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

As our march must be firm and vigorous, I ordered the Justice of the Peace of this parish to remove all the barricades that had been made in the district and place them in the depot that I will create under the direction of Captain Francisco Xavier, Commander of the site of Norte; and also to send them to citizen Manuel Rodrigues Cordeiro, so that he may forward them to Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency  
Barracks in Mostardas, July 9, 1836.  
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Colonel Bento Gonçalves da Silva  
Superior Commander of the National Guard of this Province.  
Domingos José de Almeida, Colonel Chief of Legion.
